sentences.en: All his labour has come to naught.
sentences.cn: 他的一切劳动都成泡影.

sentences.en: All our tough talk about dealing with the union came to naught.
sentences.cn: 我们在对付工会问题上的艰苦谈判毫无结果.

sentences.en: All their dreams came to naught.
All their work was for naught.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的工作都是白做.

sentences.en: All your code is for naught if users can't hop online and buy items from their favorite vendor or find out how much the newest abstract watercolor from their local gallery costs.
sentences.cn: 如果用户无法上线、无法从他们喜爱的厂商那里购买商品、无法在当地美术馆中找到最新抽象水彩画的价格，那么您的所有代码都等于零。

sentences.en: His crime has gained him naught.
sentences.cn: 他既犯了罪又一无所获.

sentences.en: His effort to help her will come to naught.
sentences.cn: 他帮助她的努力将成为泡影.

sentences.en: His efforts were brought to naught when the war broke out.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发,使他的一切努力付诸东流.

sentences.en: How many imperial inches are there in one metric centimetre? — Naught point three nine three seven inches.
sentences.cn: 一厘米等于多少英寸? ——等于0.397英寸.

sentences.en: Like the Tehran experience, the shredding may be all for naught.
sentences.cn: 如同德黑兰事件中的情况一样, 切碎文件可能是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself.
sentences.cn: 爱除了自身别无所予,除了自身别无所取.

sentences.en: They care naught for what we have been doing.
sentences.cn: 他们对我们所做的事毫不关心.

sentences.en: They cared naught for my suggestions.
sentences.cn: 他们对我的建议不感兴趣.

sentences.en: We'll be bound together tightly For we're naught if we break free.
sentences.cn: 我们紧紧地绑在一起,如果打乱了顺序就会互不相关.

sentences.en: You've bought a thing of naught.
